name: Storm Area51 VR, They Can't Stop All of Us
name_original: Storm Area51 VR, They Can't Stop All of Us
description:
Game based on a Facebook event in which the assault is planned for September 20, 2019, from 3:00 am to 6:00 am local time, in Area 51, a military air base of the United States Air Force (USAF) in the Nevada desert, to look for clues about extraterrestrial life.

More than 1.5 Million people will attend the event, but the U.S. authorities. They are willing to stop them at any cost.
